<br>
We are LinCSS, the student association for the master’s program Computational Social Sciences at LiU. Together with the student representatives of your cohort, we are here to represent YOU, the students of the master’s program. Additionally, we want to improve your student life through fun and career-advancing events like the Welcoming Week, pub crawls, Alumni Q&As, and many more.

[Want to join the action?](membership.qmd) Come be part of our community, or even apply for a board position and help us make things happen!
